body.name: Storkcraft Beckett 3-in-1 Convertible Crib (Natural) – Converts from Baby Crib to Toddler Bed and Daybed, Fits Standard Full-Size Crib Mattress, Adjustable Mattress Support Base
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 56 mins
features: 3-IN-1 CONVERTIBLE CRIB: Converts from baby crib (mattress sold separately) to toddler bed (compatible with 1 or 2 toddler guardrails), and daybed; Universal design with modern nursery style; Assembly required; Toddler guardrail sold separately

ADAPTS TO YOUR GROWING BABY: Adjustable mattress support base with 3 different height options; Designed to fit any standard full-size crib & toddler mattress; This baby crib may be used until your child can easily climb out or is taller than 35in (89cm)

GREENGUARD GOLD JPMA CERTIFIED, SAFETY TESTED: Expert tested by third-party, accredited laboratories to meet or exceed all applicable category voluntary and mandatory safety standards; Applied finish tested to meet or exceed applicable ASTM and CPSIA safety standards, JPMA CERTIFIED: GREENGUARD Gold Certified products are screened for more than 10,000 chemicals and VOCs known to pollute indoor air; Expert tested to meet or exceed all applicable category voluntary and mandatory safety standards

QUALITY CRAFTSMANSHIP: Crafted with pine wood and engineered wood; Packaging tested to reduce the risk of incidental damage that could occur during shipment; Backed by Storkcraft’s 1-year limited manufacturer’s warranty

AWARD-WINNING BRAND: Exclusively from Storkcraft, proud recipient of the 2022 Women’s Choice Award for 9 out of 10 Customer Recommended Baby & Kids Furniture and Parent Tested Parent Approved (PTPA) Seal of Approval for nursery and children’s furniture
body.description: With its modern design and timeless details, the Storkcraft Beckett 3-in-1 Convertible Crib will instantly become the spotlight of your baby's nursery. The Storkcraft Beckett features clean lines and tapered feet for a touch of mid-century design. This crib will grow with your child as it easily converts to a toddler bed (optional Storkcraft Toddler Guardrail sold separately) and daybed and offers a three-position adjustable mattress base. The Storkcraft Beckett 3-in-1 Convertible Crib is stringently tested to meet or exceed all applicable safety standards to ensure the safest sleep environment for your child. Storkcraft offers exceptional design and superior quality for your modern nursery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble! Looks great! High quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: Happy to say that after a TON of research I am so very pleased with my purchase! I got 2 of these in ‘natural’ for my twins and they are absolutely adorable and sturdy. I put them together myself, in about 2 hours give or take but it would’ve taken me less time if I didn’t have to stop periodically to tend to a baby. Everything was packaged super safely and all parts were accounted for. I don’t like to tell people what to do but please take my advice: for the love of all that is good and holy HAVE SOMEONE HELP YOU WITH INSTALLING THE METAL SPRING SUPPORT...otherwise you’ll be questioning why your kids can’t just sleep on the floor and what you could’ve possibly done in your life to cause this multitude of karma all while you mutter every swear word concoction you can think up bc the Allen wrench flings out of your fingers more times than you can count. So thankful that the highest setting is still pretty low so I won’t have to move it anytime soon. Other than that debacle, assembly was smooth. For the money it’s a great deal, two top corners on one of the cribs have small gaps where you can kind of see the pins (as seen in the pictures) bc the pieces aren’t flush and better attention to the wood grain and ‘staining’ could’ve happened for it to look more “put together” and seamless but overall those are just minor flaws that I don’t particularly worry about in this case. The wood is not soft at all, slightly heavy but not in a bad way. Would totally purchase again if I needed to 😁

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This crib is so nice in person! It was fairly easy to assemble and only took my husband and myself about 45 minutes to put together. The most time consuming part was just twisting all the screws into place. All of the parts and screws were very clearly labeled which made things so much easier. It feels very sturdy once put together and looks just like the picture!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars DON'T HESITATE! PERFECT CRIB!!!
reviews.reviewText: Negative reviews are wrong.... I spend a VERY long time researching cribs. (2 months) My baby was using a pack n' play for a few months, but was outgrowing it. I liked the breath-ability of the pack n' play since it had mesh on the sides. But It was time to upgrade.I previously purchased a graco crib with a solid back, but I returned it because: 1.) It was extremely high off the ground. Even on its lowest setting. 2.) The solid backing made me feel very uncomfortable with the lack of airflow. So with this crib I wanted something low to the ground similar to the pack n' play. I wanted something, modern, solid built. Its beautiful and modern looking, without being too much. Very solid. I had my hesitations when putting it together, but once built its VERY solid. My baby loves this crib and sleeps so much better now. I feel safe with the rails all the way around knowing there is ample airflow. I cant say enough positive things about this crib. If your hesitating, don't! Order. Its BEAUTIFUL and you wont regret it. plus, Assembly was so easy!Update*** LOVING THIS CRIB. My baby has kicked and hit the bars and there has been no damage. I recently walked though IKEA and could not believe how much better quality this crib is. Their cribs wobbled. This crib is SOLID! So pleased with my purchase and will recommend to anyone who need a sturdy well made crib!*** Second update: Make sure you purchase crib rail liners before your baby starts teething lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is beautiful, but I chose the white one and with every small hit, it leaves a mark on it, the other small issue is that although it looks harmless, the screw to fix the Matress is above the Matress level if your Matress is not super thick

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a light wood & modern looking crib for my babygirl and this was perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this crib!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Despite all the negative reviews I saw, I ended up taking a risk and ordering it anyways! Ignore all the bad reviews!!!! I’m SO GLAD I purchased this crib. It was super easy to put together (45 min-1hr max!). very sturdy. Very cute!! Good for the price and materials are not flimsy or cheap looking. Definitely get this crib if you can afford it and want something simple and modern. Love! 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fast shipping, came with all pieces, and seems very sturdy

As another reviewer mentioned who was missing a part. We were too, although it is for an optional thing so it wasn’t necessary.Also, as another reviewer had experienced there were posts on the metal portion the mattress sits on that prevented the attachments from being able to be attached from the frame. It was about 1.5 inches too short on both sides. This wasn’t discovered until the last step.Rather than take it apart and send back or try to get another one I had to drill out the posts to have the adjustable metal portions be able to be positioned to attach this portion to the frame.Needless to say this isn’t reasonable. I would suggest buying a different crib from another manufacturer.
